Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 9
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IX; sheet 2; Hieratic ritual text recto and verso. Recto 4, Verso B7-B9. Recto: The Ritual of Amenophis I Verso: Conclusion of the Ritual. A Book of Invocations. A Book of Protection.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, pp. 78-113; Vol. 2, Plate 51, Recto 4; Plate 59, Verso B7-B9. Rde 13 : 53 5 and 6
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57068) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57068)
